pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Prediction and Plotting of Generalised Additive Models // Provides functions that compute predictions from Generalised Additive Models (GAMs) fitted with 'mgcv' and return them as a tibble. These can be plotted with a generic plot()-method that uses 'ggplot2' or plotted as any other data frame. The main function is predict_gam().
